primair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: God sustains the cosmos through His spirit (ruah), taming chaos and providing sustenance, thereby creating a safe world for His creatures.

tekstueel_bewijs: God now toys with the raging waters
the world is safe in God’s hands
It is the will of God and the gift of the creator
the world is safe, that we are much safer than we had imagined
ontvanger.positie_hoorder: The hearer identifies as the Receiver of 'artificial respiration'.

tekstueel_bewijs: God’s spirit... is in fact the life-force that infuses all creation
helper.rol_van_god: God is the Subject; the Spirit is the instrumental Helper/Power.

tekstueel_bewijs: Leviathan signals the evil sea monster
tegenstander.toelichting_ernst: Chaos is presented as a recurring reality that threatens the order of creation, yet it is completely 'tamed' by the Subject.

secundair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The response of the creature to the gift of safety: moving from gratitude to public practice (justice/mercy).
secundair_narratief_programma.subject: The Grateful Human
secundair_narratief_programma.object: A different life of peace and justice
secundair_narratief_programma.toelichting_verhouding: The secondary program (ethics) is explicitly framed as a 'follow up' or 'launching pad' resulting from the primary program (grace/sustenance).

actantieel_schema_visualisatie.helper_subject_tegenstander: Holy Spirit → God the Creator ← Chaos/Leviathan

voorbeelden_god_subject: God wills the world to be in a healthy, functioning way
God now toys with the raging waters
God the creator is like a great iron lung
voorbeelden_mens_subject: we could hunker down in our privilege
we are freed to look beyond ourselves
the world cannot hold its own breath

voorbeelden: the wicked... let them be no more
It is the will of God
we are freed to look beyond ourselves
all of that is possible because the spirit continues to surge

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon focuses on God's 'Power to do' (Pouvoir) which creates a new 'Ability' in the human, rather than a 'Duty' (Devoir).

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: God's 'ruah' acts as the mediator that negates the power of S2.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: High; Leviathan and modern 'pathologies' are acknowledged as real threats before being subordinated.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: The sermon is profoundly theocentric. God is the primary actor of almost all significant verbs. The human role is defined by reception and subsequent gratitude.

indicatoren_moralisme.tekstueel_bewijs: Imagine God’s glad, safe, grateful, generous creatures

indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: Everything depends upon the God who gives artificial respiration to a world at every instant.
The world cannot hold its own breath... it cannot generate the breath of life.

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: Biblical figures are not used as moral models; the Psalm itself is treated as a witness to God's character.

identificatie_patroon.theologische_implicatie: Monergistic sustenance; the world exists because of God's faithfulness, not human effort.

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: The transition from the 'Fundamental Program' (God sustains) to the 'Secondary Program' (Human justice) is logically linked via 'Gratitude'.
spanning_punten: The 'harsh note' of verse 35 (sinners consumed) feels slightly disconnected from the 'rubber ducky' imagery.

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: the spirit... is in fact the life-force that infuses all creation

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: The Spirit provides the 'Pouvoir-vivre' (Power to live) that the creature lacks.

hamartologie.ernst_diagnose: Moderate; sin is seen as 'squandering' or 'possessing' rather than an ontological death, though 'breathlessness' implies death.

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The sermon successfully maintains God as the Subject. The narrative engine is fueled by God's reliability, not human striving.

modale_balans.voorgestelde_balans: Maintain current balance; it serves the Pentecost theme well.
modale_balans.concrete_suggestie: Ensure the 'Secondary Program' (Justice) doesn't turn into a new 'Devoir' (Must) in the final sentences.

tegenstander_intensivering.huidige_status: Chaos is described as a 'rubber ducky'.
tegenstander_intensivering.voorgestelde_intensivering: Acknowledge that while chaos is a 'rubber ducky' to God, it remains a 'Leviathan' to us.
tegenstander_intensivering.theologische_rationale: To avoid 'cheap grace' or a trivialization of suffering (cancer, terrorism).

narratieve_hierarchie_herstel.voorgestelde_structuur: Soteriology (God breathes) → Ethics (We act in gratitude).

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: This sermon is a masterclass in theocentric preaching. It avoids the 'Calvinist nervousness' by grounding the Spirit's work in the reliable act of Creation.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: Rhetorical analysis would focus on the 'iron lung' metaphor; Greimas focus shows that the 'iron lung' is the Subject that grants competence to a helpless Receiver.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Exegesis explains the Hebrew 'ruah'; Greimas shows how 'ruah' functions as the Helper in the Axis of Power.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Reveals that the sermon's 'engine' is the negation of human autonomy (the 'autonomous system' of modern science) in favor of divine heteronomy.

volledige_subject_lijst: God (sends, creates, renews, hides, takes, forms, breathes, toys, opens, gives)
We (know, gather, turn, look, are freed)
appendices.notities: The sermon successfully avoids the 'If-Then' trap of moralism.
